metadata.title: CVE-2016-3833 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The Shell component in Android 5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before 5.1.1, and6.x before 2016-08-01 does not properly manage the MANAGE_USERS andCREATE_USERS permissions, which allows attackers to bypass intended accessrestrictions via a crafted application, aka internal bug 29189712.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
